CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1986 CODE
This table give2~2~s the location within this Code of those sections of the 1986 Code which are included herein. Sections of the 1986 Code not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances included herein, see the table immediately following this table.
